name: Parallel Task Create
description: Create a new research task using Parallel.ai Task API. This integration starts a web research task and returns a run_id that can be used to retrieve results later. Use 'Parallel Task Get Results' to retrieve the completed research.

inputs.title: Parallel API Key
inputs.description: Your Parallel.ai API key for authenticating requests.

inputs.title: Research Task
inputs.description: The research query or task description. Describe what information and insights you need from the internet.
inputs.default: Research the latest developments in renewable energy technology in 2024.

inputs.title: Output Schema (Optional)
inputs.description: JSON schema defining the structure of the desired output. If not provided, the API will return unstructured text results. Use this to get organized, structured data.

summary.description: A concise summary of the research findings

inputs.title: Processor Type
inputs.description: Which processor to use: 'lite' (fastest, basic research), 'base' (balanced speed/accuracy), 'core' (comprehensive analysis), 'pro' (advanced reasoning), or 'ultra' (maximum accuracy and depth).
